thread.title: Here’s why Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif will head to Austria soon
thread.title_full: Here’s why Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif will head to Austria soon - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Here’s why Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif will head to Austria soon
text:
'Sultan' director Ali Abbas Zafar is all set to reunite Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif on screen for his ambitious project 'Tiger Zinda Hai'. The sequel to the 2012 hit 'Ek Tha Tiger' has been in news for quite some time now and is finally scheduled to go on floors in March.
Salman Khan to head out on a vacay after ‘Tubelight’? Salman Khan is looking forward to take some time off with his family.
According to reports, Salman and Katrina will head to Austria in March to kick-start the film's shoot. The first schedule reportedly begins on March 15 in the European country. While 'Ek Tha Tiger' revolved around an Indian spy who falls in love with a Pakistani agent, the sequel is touted to be a political thriller that revolves around the subject of political espionage. With 'Tiger Zinda Hai', Salman and Katrina will cast their spell on the silver screen after five years.
Blackbuck poaching case: Salman Khan records statement, claims innocence 01:43
